title: 93/213/EEC: Commission Decision of 18 March 1993 on the organization of a temporary experiment with regard to the maximum content of inert matter in soya bean seed
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 18 March 1993 on the organization of a temporary experiment with regard to the maximum content of inert matter in soya bean seed
(93/213/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: A temporary experiment shall be organized at Community level, under the conditions specified in Article 2, in order to assess whether the standards or other conditions applicable to soya bean seed in respect of the percentage by weight of  inert matter, under Section I (3) (C) (c) of Annex II to Directive 69/208/EEC should be amended to the extent that the component described as 'pieces of broken or damaged seed units half or less than half the original size', should be disregarded.

1. Any Member State may participate in the experiment.
2. Member States shall inform the Commission whether they have decided to participate in the experiment.
3. The experiment shall end on 30 June 1995. Member States may decide to cease to participate in the experiment at an earlier date.
4. Before the end of each year Member States shall submit to the Commission and to the other Member States a progress report and a report on the results of the experiment.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 March 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
